About the Company: Solitaire Machine Tools Ltd (SMTL) is a leading manufacturer of Precision Centerless Grinders in India. SMTL offers Rebuilding and CNC Retrofitting services to customers for any model of Cincinnati Centerless Grinders.SMTL also manufactures small Centerless Grinders with 100 mm ( 4` ) wheel width ( No.1) and large Centerless Grinders with 500 mm ( 20` ) wheel width (No.3).The grinders are offered standard with conventional hydraulic and pneumatic controls. More advanced CNC versions utilizing Siemens Controls and supporting from 1 to 6 axes of control are also being offered. Optionally, SMTL also designs customized loading / unloading systems for complete automation of the grinding process.
